ai-tha-ap166:1.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap166:1.3_0: after going up into the sky, while in the air,
ai-tha-ap166:2.1_0: The Teacher, while standing in that place,
ai-tha-ap166:3.2_0: in that the great sage saw a great sage,
ai-tha-ap166:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap166:3.4_0: this fruit is taught from the winning.”
ai-tha-ap166:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūraṇa Kassapa.
ai-tha-ap166:7.1_0: to preach the fourth Elder Nun Piṇḍaka
